Package ch.iserver.ace.collaboration.jupiter.server

Interface Summary
AccessControlStrategy An AccessControlStrategy determines how to handle join requests.
CompositeForwarder Forwarder built on the Composite design pattern.
FailureHandler Interface to be implemented by an object that is interested to be notified about failing ParticipantConnection instances.
Forwarder A Forwarder is used on the server to forward incoming events to participants.
ParticipantManager Class that manages a set of participants.
PublisherPort A PublisherPort extends the ParticipantPort interface with methods available to the publisher of a document.
ServerDocument A ServerDocument is used by the ServerLogic and the DocumentUpdateProxy to keep an up-to-date copy of the document content on the server-side.
ServerLogic Extended interface for internal use of the server logic.
 

Class Summary
ParticipantConnectionWrapper Fail-safe wrapper for ParticipantConnection objects.
ParticipantPortImpl Default implementation of the ParticipantPort interface.
PublisherConnectionWrapper Failsafe wrapper for a PublisherConnection.
PublisherPortImpl Default implementation of the PublisherPort interface.
ServerDocumentImpl Default implementation of the ServerDocument.
ServerDocumentImpl.FragmentImpl Implementation of the Fragment interface.
ServerDocumentImpl.ParticipantInfo Helper object to contain information about a participant.
ServerDocumentImpl.PortableDocumentImpl Implementation of the PortableDocument interface from the network layer.
ServerLogicImpl Default implementation of the ServerLogic interface.
 

Exception Summary
ServerDocumentException Exception thrown by the ServerDocument implementations.
